trans-unit.source: Enables debugging and help information features for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> properties from a configuration file or programmatically to enable the flow of managed exception information to the client for debugging purposes as well as the publication of HTML information files for users browsing the service in Web browsers.
trans-unit.target: 從組態檔使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> 屬性或以程式設計的方式讓 Managed 例外狀況資訊的流量進入用戶端以便偵錯，以及發行可讓使用者在 Web 瀏覽器中瀏覽服務的 HTML 資訊檔案。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property to `true` to instruct [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to return managed exception information in SOAP faults to clients for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> 屬性設為 `true` 會指示 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 在 SOAP 錯誤中傳回 Managed 例外狀況資訊給用戶端，以進行偵錯。

trans-unit.source: Returning managed exception information to clients can be a security risk because exception details expose information about the internal service implementation that could be used by unauthorized clients.
trans-unit.target: 將 Managed 例外狀況資訊傳回用戶端可能導致安全性風險，因為例外狀況詳細資料會公開未授權的用戶端可使用的內部服務實作相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: In addition, although the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> properties can also be set programmatically, it can be easy to forget to disable <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> when deploying.
trans-unit.target: 此外，雖然也能以程式設計方式設定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> 屬性，不過在部署時很容易會忘記停用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because of the security issues involved, it is strongly recommended that:
trans-unit.target: 由於牽涉到安全性議題，我們強烈建議您：

trans-unit.source: You use an application configuration file to set the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 使用應用程式的組態檔將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> 屬性的值設定為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: You only do so only in controlled debugging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 您只能在受控制的偵錯狀況下這樣做。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the security issues related to managed exception information, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 安全性問題與 managed 例外狀況資訊，請參閱[指定與處理合約和服務中的錯誤](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> properties instruct the service to publish HTML help files when the service is viewed using an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> 屬性會在使用 HTML 瀏覽器檢視服務時，指示服務要發行 HTML 說明檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> properties control the location of the HTML help page that is viewed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 屬性會控制所檢視的 HTML 說明頁的位置。

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> features using a configuration file:
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用組態檔啟用或停用其中一項 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> 功能：

trans-unit.source: Add a `behaviorConfiguration` attribute to the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element for your [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: 新增`behaviorConfiguration`屬性[<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)元素您[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]服務。

trans-unit.source: Endpoint behaviors are configured on [\<endpoint>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017) elements; service behaviors on [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) elements.
trans-unit.target: 上所設定的端點行為[\<端點 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017)項目，而服務行為會在[<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: Add to or create a [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) section and add a [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element to that with the name that matches the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute value from step 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入或建立[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md)區段，加入[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)元素的名稱符合`behaviorConfiguration`步驟 1 中屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Endpoint behaviors are configured using an [<endpointBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md) element; service behaviors are configured using a [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 使用設定端點行為[ <endpointBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md)項目，而服務行為使用設定[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: Add a [<serviceDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md) element to the [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element from step 2 and enable or disable the various properties appropriate to your scenario.
trans-unit.target: 新增[ <serviceDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md)元素[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)步驟 2 中的項目，啟用或停用適當的各種屬性您的案例。

trans-unit.source: For a specific example, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如需特定範例，請參閱＜範例＞一節。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use a configuration file to enable the HTML help page feature and return exception information inside a SOAP fault back to the client for debugging purposes, in addition to enabling metadata support.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用組態檔來啟用 HTML 說明頁功能，並將 SOAP 錯誤內部的例外狀況資訊傳回至用戶端，以供偵錯之用 (除了啟用中繼資料支援)。

trans-unit.source: This configuration file shows the following basic steps to adding support for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> features:
trans-unit.target: 這個組態檔會示範下列基本步驟來加入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> 功能的支援：

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> type is an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation, the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element that represents the service type has a behavior configuration identifier of `behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"`.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior>型別是<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作， [<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)代表服務類型的項目都有的行為組態識別碼`behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"`。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> type is an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation a [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element is added to a [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) section.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior>型別是<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)項目加入至[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md)> 一節。

trans-unit.source: Set the `name` attribute of the [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element the value of which is the identifier of the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute of the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 設定`name`屬性[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)元素的值是識別碼`behaviorConfiguration`屬性[<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value is `metadataAndDebug`.
trans-unit.target: 此處的值為 `metadataAndDebug`。

trans-unit.source: Add a [<serviceDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md) element with the various attributes set to the desired configuration.
trans-unit.target: 新增[ <serviceDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md)具有各種屬性項目設定為所需的設定。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the `httpHelpPageEnabled` and `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` attribute values are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此處的 `httpHelpPageEnabled` 和 `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` 屬性值都會設定為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior" /> class.
The constructor creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> object with the following defaults:
trans-unit.target: 此建構函式 (Constructor) 會使用下列預設值建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> 物件：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> 屬性為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> 屬性為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> 屬性為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> property is the base address of the service that supports HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> 屬性是支援 HTTP 要求之服務的基底位址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> is the base address of the service that supports HTTPS requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 是支援 HTTPS 要求之服務的基底位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets high-level access to the definition of a binding.
A channel binding.
trans-unit.target: 通道繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that controls whether [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] publishes an HTML help page at the address controlled by the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl" /> property.
<see langword="true" /> if [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] publishes an HTML help page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 發行 HTML 說明頁，則為 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> 屬性設為 `false`，以停用 HTML 瀏覽器可見的 HTML 說明頁的發行。

trans-unit.source: To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property, you must set this property to `true` and then one of the following conditions must also be true:
trans-unit.target: 如果要確保 HTML 說明頁是在由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 屬性控制的位置發行，必須將這個屬性設定為 `true`，而且下列條件中必須有一個成立：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property is an absolute address that supports the HTTP protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 屬性是支援 HTTP 通訊協定配置的絕對位址。

trans-unit.source: There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTP protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: 有支援 HTTP 通訊協定配置的服務的基底位址。

trans-unit.source: Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTP protocol scheme is assigned to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.
trans-unit.target: 如果將不支援 HTTP 通訊協定配置的絕對位址指派至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 屬性，將會擲回例外狀況，但是其他任何不符合前述條件的情況都會造成沒有例外狀況和沒有 HTML 說明頁。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use a configuration file to enable the HTML help page feature and return exception information inside a SOAP fault back to the client for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用組態檔來啟用 HTML 說明頁功能，並將 SOAP 錯誤內部的例外狀況資訊傳回至用戶端，以供偵錯之用。

trans-unit.source: This configuration file shows the following basic steps to adding support for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> features:
trans-unit.target: 這個組態檔會示範下列基本步驟來加入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> 功能的支援：

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> type is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation, the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element that represents the service type has a behavior configuration identifier of `behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"`.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior>型別是<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作， [<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)代表服務類型的項目都有的行為組態識別碼`behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"`。

trans-unit.source: Again, because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> type is an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation a [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element is added to a [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) section.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，因為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior>型別是<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)項目加入至[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) > 一節。

trans-unit.source: The `name` attribute of the [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element the value of which is the identifier of the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute of the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element.
trans-unit.target: `name`屬性[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)元素的值是識別碼`behaviorConfiguration`屬性[<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value is `metadataAndDebug`.
trans-unit.target: 此處的值為 `metadataAndDebug`。

trans-unit.source: Add a [<serviceDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md) element with the various attributes set to the desired configuration.
trans-unit.target: 新增[ <serviceDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md)具有各種屬性項目設定為所需的設定。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the `httpHelpPageEnabled` and `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` attribute values are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此處的 `httpHelpPageEnabled` 和 `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` 屬性值都會設定為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location at which the HTML help file is published.
The relative or absolute HTTP-based URL of the custom HTML help file that the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 HTML 瀏覽器檢視端點時，使用者所看到的自訂 HTML 說明檔的相對或絕對 HTTP URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTP/Get request such as that of an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> 屬性來啟用從 HTTP/Get 要求 (例如，從 HTML 瀏覽器) 傳回的自訂 HTML 說明檔。

trans-unit.source: The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows:
trans-unit.target: HTML 說明檔的位置解析如下：

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is a relative address, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTP requests plus this property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值是相對位址，則 HTML 說明檔的位置就是支援 HTTP 要求的服務基底位址的值，加上這個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTP requests, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值是絕對位址且支援 HTTP 要求，則 HTML 說明檔的位置就是這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTP requests, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值是絕對位址，但不支援 HTTP 要求，便會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property is applied only in the case that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> 屬性是 `true` 時，才能套用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets high-level access to the definition of a binding.
A channel binding.
trans-unit.target: 通道繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] returns an HTML help file over HTTPS at the address controlled by the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl" /> property.
<see langword="true" /> if an HTML help file is returned to clients making an HTTPS/GET request such as that of an HTML browser; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 HTML 說明檔傳回至提出 HTTPS/GET 要求的用戶端 (例如，從 HTML 瀏覽器)，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> 屬性設為 `false`，以停用 HTML 瀏覽器可見的 HTML 說明頁的發行。

trans-unit.source: To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property, you must set this property to `true` and then one of the following conditions must also be true:
trans-unit.target: 如果要確保 HTML 說明頁是在由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 屬性控制的位置發行，必須將這個屬性設定為 `true`，而且下列條件中必須有一個成立：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property is an absolute address that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 屬性是支援 HTTPS 通訊協定配置的絕對位址。

trans-unit.source: There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: 有支援 HTTPS 通訊協定配置的服務的基底位址。

trans-unit.source: Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTPS protocol scheme is assigned to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.
trans-unit.target: 如果將不支援 HTTPS 通訊協定配置的絕對位址指派至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 屬性，將會擲回例外狀況，但是其他任何不符合前述條件的情況都會造成沒有例外狀況和沒有 HTML 說明頁。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location at which an HTML file is published for retrieval using HTTPS.
The relative or absolute HTTPS-based URL of the custom HTML help file that the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 HTML 瀏覽器檢視端點時，使用者所看到的自訂 HTML 說明檔的相對或絕對 HTTPS URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTPS/Get request such as that of an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 屬性來啟用從 HTTPS/Get 要求 (例如，從 HTML 瀏覽器) 傳回的自訂 HTML 說明檔。

trans-unit.source: The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows:
trans-unit.target: HTML 說明檔的位置解析如下：

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is a relative address, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTPS requests plus this property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值是相對位址，則 HTML 說明檔的位置就是支援 HTTPS 要求的服務基底位址的值，加上這個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTPS requests, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值是絕對位址且支援 HTTPS 要求，則 HTML 說明檔的位置就是這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTPS requests, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值是絕對位址，但不支援 HTTPS 要求，便會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property is applied only in the case that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> 屬性是 `true` 時，才能套用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to include managed exception information in the detail of SOAP faults returned to the client for debugging purposes.
<see langword="true" /> if [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] returns managed exception information in the SOAP faults for client debugging purposes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 要在 SOAP 錯誤中傳回 Managed 例外狀況資訊，以供用戶端偵錯之用，則為 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property to `true` to instruct [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to return managed exception information to the client in SOAP faults to ease debugging.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> 屬性設為 `true`，會指示 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 在 SOAP 錯誤中傳回 Managed 例外狀況資訊給用戶端，以簡化偵錯程序。

trans-unit.source: Returning managed exception information to clients can be a security risk because exception details expose information about the internal service implementation that could be used by unauthorized clients.
trans-unit.target: 將 Managed 例外狀況資訊傳回用戶端可能導致安全性風險，因為例外狀況詳細資料會公開未授權的用戶端可使用的內部服務實作相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: In addition, although the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> properties can also be set programmatically, it can be easy to forget to disable <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> when deploying.
trans-unit.target: 此外，雖然也能以程式設計方式設定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> 屬性，不過在部署時很容易會忘記停用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because of the security issues involved, it is strongly recommended that:
trans-unit.target: 由於牽涉到安全性議題，我們強烈建議您：

trans-unit.source: You use an application configuration file to set the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 使用應用程式的組態檔將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> 屬性的值設定為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: You only do so only in controlled debugging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 您只能在受控制的偵錯狀況下這樣做。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [指定與處理合約和服務中的錯誤](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use a configuration file to enable the HTML help page feature and return exception information inside a SOAP fault back to the client for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用組態檔來啟用 HTML 說明頁功能，並將 SOAP 錯誤內部的例外狀況資訊傳回至用戶端，以供偵錯之用。

trans-unit.source: This configuration file shows the following basic steps to adding support for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> features:
trans-unit.target: 這個組態檔會示範下列基本步驟來加入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> 功能的支援：

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> type is an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation, the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element that represents the service type has a behavior configuration identifier of `behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"`.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior>型別是<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作， [<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)代表服務類型的項目都有的行為組態識別碼`behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"`。

trans-unit.source: Again, because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> type is an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation a [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element is added to a [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) section.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，因為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior>型別是<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)項目加入至[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) > 一節。

trans-unit.source: Set the `name` attribute of the [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element the value of which is the identifier of the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute of the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 設定`name`屬性[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)元素的值是識別碼`behaviorConfiguration`屬性[<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value is `metadataAndDebug`.
trans-unit.target: 此處的值為 `metadataAndDebug`。

trans-unit.source: Add a [<serviceDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md) element with the various attributes set to the desired configuration.
trans-unit.target: 新增[ <serviceDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md)具有各種屬性項目設定為所需的設定。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the `httpHelpPageEnabled` and `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` attribute values are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此處的 `httpHelpPageEnabled` 和 `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` 屬性值都會設定為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
The service host.
The endpoints for the service.
The binding parameters that support modifying the bindings.

Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase,System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" /> method to support the behavior.
Modifies the bindings to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 修改繫結以支援行為。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
The service host.

Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> method to support the behavior.
The service description.
The service host.

Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> method to support the behavior.
